name: Screensaver Panels
author: LCDPossible Team
description: Animated screensaver effects including starfield, matrix rain, bouncing logo, pac-man, and more.

panelTypes.description: Plays a random screensaver effect or cycles through all
panelTypes.helpText:
Meta-panel that plays screensaver effects.

Modes:
- screensaver:random - Pick a random screensaver
- screensaver:cycle - Cycle through all screensavers
- screensaver:<name> - Play a specific screensaver

Available screensavers: starfield, matrix-rain, bouncing-logo, mystify, plasma, fire, game-of-life, bubbles, rain, spiral, clock, noise, warp-tunnel, pipes, asteroids, missile-command, falling-blocks

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Screensaver mode or specific effect name

panelTypes.description: Classic starfield warp effect with stars streaming from center
panelTypes.helpText:
Classic space starfield warp effect.

Features:
- Stars stream outward from center
- Multiple star layers for depth
- Speed increases as stars move outward
- Smooth 60fps animation

Inspired by the classic Windows starfield screensaver.

panelTypes.description: Digital rain effect inspired by The Matrix
panelTypes.helpText:
Green digital rain cascading down the screen.

Features:
- Random katakana and ASCII characters
- Glowing lead characters
- Fading trails
- Variable speed columns

Inspired by the iconic visual from The Matrix films.

panelTypes.description: Logo bouncing off screen edges (DVD screensaver style)
panelTypes.helpText:
The classic DVD logo bouncing around the screen.

Features:
- Logo bounces off all edges
- Color changes on each bounce
- Smooth diagonal movement
- Occasional corner hits!

Relive the eternal wait for the logo to hit the corner perfectly.

panelTypes.description: Bouncing connected polygons with color trails
panelTypes.helpText:
Classic Windows Mystify screensaver recreation.

Features:
- Two connected polygon shapes
- Vertices bounce independently
- Rainbow color cycling
- Smooth trailing effect

A faithful recreation of the classic Windows 3.1/95 screensaver.

Psychedelic plasma effect from the demoscene era.

Features:
- Smooth color gradients
- Multiple overlapping sine waves
- Palette cycling animation
- Hypnotic visual patterns

A tribute to the classic demoscene visual effects of the 90s.

panelTypes.description: Classic demoscene fire effect with palette animation
panelTypes.helpText:
Classic fire effect with realistic flames.

Features:
- Procedural flame generation
- Heat-based color palette
- Rising flames with cooling
- Flickering base heat source

Another classic demoscene effect, popular in the 90s demo scene.

panelTypes.description: Conway's cellular automaton with colorful patterns
panelTypes.helpText:
Conway's Game of Life cellular automaton.

Features:
- Classic B3/S23 rules
- Color-coded cell age
- Auto-reset when stable/empty
- Random pattern initialization

Watch cells live, die, and create emergent patterns.

Colorful translucent bubbles floating around.

Features:
- Various bubble sizes
- Soft reflections and highlights
- Gentle floating motion
- Translucent overlapping

A relaxing, calming visual effect.

Realistic rain falling on a window.

Features:
- Varying raindrop sizes
- Splash effects at bottom
- Streaking water trails
- Atmospheric blue tint

A calming rain visualization.

Hypnotic rotating spiral pattern.

Features:
- Smooth rotation animation
- Alternating color bands
- Creates optical illusion
- Adjustable speed

Warning: May be hypnotic. Not recommended for extended viewing.

panelTypes.description: Analog clock with smooth second hand
panelTypes.helpText:
Classic analog clock display.

Features:
- Hour, minute, and second hands
- Smooth second hand animation
- Clean, minimal design
- Accurate system time

A functional and elegant screensaver.

Classic TV static / snow effect.

Features:
- Random pixel noise
- Authentic analog TV look
- Subtle scan line effect
- Full-screen coverage

Reminiscent of analog TV static when no signal was present.

panelTypes.description: Flying through a colorful warp tunnel
panelTypes.helpText:
Flying through a colorful warp tunnel.

Features:
- 3D tunnel perspective
- Rainbow color cycling
- Speed variation effects
- Smooth animation

Like traveling through a hyperspace tunnel.

panelTypes.description: 3D pipes growing in random directions (classic Windows)
panelTypes.helpText:
Classic Windows 3D Pipes screensaver.

Features:
- Pipes grow in random directions
- Multiple pipe colors
- Joint connections at turns
- Fills screen then resets

A faithful recreation of the beloved Windows screensaver.

panelTypes.description: Asteroids game simulation with vector graphics
panelTypes.helpText:
Classic Asteroids arcade game simulation.

Features:
- AI-controlled ship
- Vector-style graphics
- Asteroid splitting physics
- Auto-play demonstration

Watch an AI pilot play the classic arcade game.

Classic Missile Command arcade game simulation.

Features:
- AI-controlled defense
- Incoming missiles and MIRVs
- Explosion effects
- City defense gameplay

Watch an AI defend the cities from nuclear attack.

panelTypes.description: Tetris-style falling blocks simulator with AI gameplay
panelTypes.helpText:
Tetris-style falling blocks with AI players.

Modes:
- falling-blocks:1 - Single player AI
- falling-blocks:2 - Two player split-screen AI
- falling-blocks:3 - Three player AI

Features:
- Classic tetromino pieces
- AI players with varying skill
- Score tracking
- Line clear animations

Watch AI players compete in the classic puzzle game.
